effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 883,610 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 436,327.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,313 to 8,938 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 271 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 331 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 51,014 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 115,947.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
Use: Zap yourself for 216,211 Nature damage, gaining 14,594 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)
